alert.note: Alert for New Haven (Connecticut) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS New York City - Upton (Long Island and New York City)
info.headline: Flood Warning issued September 30 at 12:38AM EDT until October 01 at 9:12PM EDT by NWS New York City - Upton
info.description: ...FLOOD WARNING NOW IN EFFECT UNTIL 245 AM EDT EARLY THIS MORNING... * WHAT...Flooding caused by excessive rainfall from earlier continues. * WHERE...A portion of southern Connecticut, including the following county, New Haven. * WHEN...Until 245 AM EDT. * IMPACTS...Flooding along the Pomperaug River continues due to heavy rainfall from earlier. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 1231 AM EDT, The Pomperaug River at Southbury is reporting moderate flooding. The river is gradually falling and is forecast to fall below flood stage later this morning. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood
info.instruction: Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles.
